title: _livecasino.io_

content: Hello dear BitcoinTalk Community!We noticed that some of you have been talking about Slots games on Livecasino.io so we have decided that this week promo would take that interest into account Livecasino.io Promo for this weekend is for 1mBTC in Free spins for Folsom Prison!!!Livecasino.io BitcoinTalk Promo #22 will work like this:Reward1mBTC in free spins for Folsom Prison from NoLimitCity!How?Opt-in by sending  PM with your livecasino.io username (please use BitcoinTalk promo #22 as PM subject to facilitate the management)Wager at least 10 mBTC on any games on Livecasino.io, including slots!Make at least deposit during campaign periodPromo durationThis Promo will be running from the moment of this post, until Sunday 10th July 23:59 GMTRulesAll BitcoinTalk users can participateMulti accounts will not be eligible for the rewardThe reward will be credited to the livecasino.io accounts on Monday 11th July, 17:00 GMTFree spin has 1x wagering requirementAll bets and winnings will be withdrawable from the free spinsNormal livecasino.io terms and conditions still applyDue to Game Providers country restrictions, some participants may have to receive a different, but equivalent rewardWe hope you enjoy!Flávio from livecasino.io team
